basics.name: Aubin Birba
basics.label: PhD Student in Computer Science
basics.summary: PhD student and computer engineer, I aim to help create a safer and more privacy-respecting digital world. Committed to developing innovative solutions and sharing my knowledge, I seek to make a significant contribution in the field of computer science through my scientific and pedagogical contributions.

work.name: Laboratoire de didactique des mathématiques, UQÀM
École des Sciences de Gestion, UQÀM
work.summary: Data processing for a research project on the role of property assessment in the city of Montréal.

work.name: Expleo Group
work.summary: Assistance in developing a methodology for integrating security into software development from conception. Development of a tool to help apply the methodology.

work.name: Z Smart Services
work.summary: Design and development of a scientific publication management tool.

volunteer.organization: Association des Étudiants aux Cycles Supérieurs en Informatique (AECSI) at UQÀM
volunteer.summary: Secretary of the graduate students association in computer science.

certificates.summary: Comprehensive cybersecurity training covering threat detection, incident response, and security tools
